name: move past
description:
It's called Touch for Best Friends and it's set in a world where everyone is the opposite sex. And all them are My Little Pony hentai videos.
Here's what the game looks like. You can watch the video in full here, but here's the teaser. Now you just need to get those friends over to the Rainbow Square park to play. 'Touch for Best Friends' is set to release for Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360 and PC on September 30. You can check out more of our coverage of Touch for Best Friends in the meantime.
